description: Enterprise techniques used by LaZagne, ATT&CK software S0349 v1.0
name: LaZagne (S0349)

techniques.comment: LaZagne can perform credential dumping to obtain account and password information.[1]
LaZagne can obtain credentials from web browsers such as Google Chrome, Internet Explorer, and Firefox.[1]
LaZagne can obtain credentials from browsers, chats, databases, mail, and WiFi.[1]
